stock.view

Interface IStockView

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GUIStockView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainView, StockView

    public interface IStockView
    The view interface for virtual trading application. It provides methods to send user input to the controller and accept input from the controller to output onto the view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush()
      Flushes the input source from the current point.
      java.lang.String read()
      Reads the input from the input source and returns it as string to the controller.
      void write(java.lang.String output)
      Writes the output from the controller onto the corresponding output source.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        java.lang.String read()
               throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Reads the input from the input source and returns it as string to the controller.
        Returns:
        the input from the source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if input source throws any error.

      • write

        void write(java.lang.String output)
    throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Writes the output from the controller onto the corresponding output source.
        Parameters:
        output - the string to be output on the view.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the output source throws any error.

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flushes the input source from the current point. Mostly used if corrupt input encountered results in ignoring the next inputs.
